primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To withdrawal CAD using the Ndax mobile app, follow these steps:

  1. Log in to the NDAX app.
  2. On the bottom navigation bar, tap the WALLET icon (left of the NDAX logo).
  3. Select Fiat.
  4. Tap CAD (Canadian Dollar).
  5. Tap WITHDRAW.
  6. Enter the amount you would like to withdraw or select a percentage of your CAD balance.
  7. Choose your withdrawal method: EFT Direct or Interac e-Transfer.
  8. If you selected EFT:
    • Select your BANK ACCOUNT, or
    • If it's your first time withdrawing, tap ADD BANK ACCOUNT and enter your Institution, Transit, and Account numbers.
  9. Tap WITHDRAW.
  10. Tap CONFIRM.
  11. Enter the six-digit 2FA authentication code from your 2FA app.
  12. Confirm your withdrawal by clicking the link in the confirmation email.

Processing Times:

  • EFT Withdrawals: Processed twice daily on business days at 8:00 AM and 4:00 PM EST. Funds typically arrive within 1 business day, depending on your bank.
  • Interac e-Transfers: Usually received within a few minutes but may take up to 30â€“60 minutes.
